org.sd.util.thread
Class DirectoryMonitor

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.sd.util.thread.DirectoryMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class DirectoryMonitor
extends java.lang.Thread

Class to monitor a directory for new contents to process.

As each entry in the (typically 'Ready' bucket) directory is processed, it is moved from its bucket to the active and processed (or failed input) buckets.

Any output created by the file processor also starts in the processing bucket and is moved to the finished (or failed output) bucket.

Author:
Spence Koehler

forwardOutput

public void forwardOutput(java.lang.String[] destHostnames,
                          java.lang.String[] destBaseJobPaths,
                          Bucket[] localRestorations,
                          Bucket[] remoteRestorations,
                          Bucket[] remoteDeletions,
                          boolean moveToSentBucket,
                          java.io.File[] optionalSpecificResults)
Forward the output to each host's corresponding baseJobPath.

Parameters:
destHostnames - The hosts to which the output should be forwarded.
destBaseJobPaths - The base paths of the job on the destination machines that will be processing the forwarded results as input. These paths correspond to the job's working directory that is the parent to all of the bucket directories.
localRestorations - Buckets from which results should be moved into the finished output bucket before forwarding. Usually, data that is being resent would be moved from the "sent" bucket back into the finished bucket.
remoteRestorations - Buckets from which forwarded results should first be copied into the destination's receiving area for taking advantage of rsync'ing instead of retransferring all data.
remoteDeletions - Buckets from which forwarded results will be deleted. This is intended for clearing results that should be recomputed from the incoming data.
moveToSentBucket - If true, each sent result will be moved to the sent bucket.
optionalSpecificResults - If non-null, then just these results will be forwarded; otherwise, all results in the local "sent" bucket will be forwarded.

shutdown

public void shutdown(boolean now)
Shutdown this directory monitor.
